changeSet.author: vgaikwad
changeSet.id: Consent response PV category

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from catissue_cde where public_id = 'consent_response'

changeSet.sql: insert into catissue_cde (public_id, long_name, definition, version, last_updated) values ('consent_response', 'Consent Response', 'Consent Response', 2.0, ${now});
